safetyTips: Commissions for upholstery being taken by photo quotes and contactless pick up and drop off.
name: Take a Seat Upholstery
description: Take a Seat ; selling and delivering one off pieces of upholstered furniture, hand made colourful cushions and fusion mineral paint ( furniture paint) Commissions for upholstery being taken by photo quotes and contactless pick up and drop off. Facebook and Insta @takeaseatupholstery ! Running a virtual Saturday market every week so new followers welcome!
